text: @Tobias_Ellwood You’re all ridiculous! Bournemouth Council and local police force should have foreseen this outcome. And to all if you total imbeciles desperate to catch Covid-19 with your suntan, don’t you dare complain when lockdown is imposed heavier than before! Selfish and thick!
